title: We All Have Mental Health
description: Animated video exploring mental health for students with relatable scenarios about stress, anxiety, and seeking help.

title: College Student Mental Health 101
description: Overview of common campus mental health concerns and how college students can access and use campus resources.

title: Child Mental Health (ShinShin Tang)
description: Animated explanation for young students about emotions, anxiety, and how feelings affect behavior.

title: Talking Mental Health (Anna Freud NCCF)
description: Video for children introducing mental health, emotional awareness, and seeking help through relatable storytelling.

title: Tom Has Separation Anxiety Disorder
description: For young students, this video addresses fears associated with separation, anxiety, and how to get support.

title: Lucy’s Blue Day
description: Using color symbolism, Lucy explores changing moods and depression, teaching students about emotional fluctuations.

title: Inside Out (Trailer & Discussion)
description: The film explains emotional complexity through animated characters, making mental health concepts easy for students.

title: Teen Health: Mental Health (Penn State PRO Wellness)
description: Educational video with statistics and practical tips for teens about mental health and self-care.

title: Overcoming Anxiety — BBC
description: Animations recount two students’ experiences with anxiety, showing coping strategies and building empathy.

title: Mental Health & School: Above the Noise Compilation
description: Compilation of videos discussing mental health issues in school environments, covering peer stress and support systems.

title: Why Students Should Have Mental Health Days
description: TEDx Talk on mental health days for students, stress reduction, and changing policies for well-being.

title: Annie's Story: A Student's Perspective
description: Personal story of a university student discussing struggles and practical ways to support mental health.

title: Mental Health and Wellness for Students
description: Explains school-based mental health supports, highlighting programs and resources available to students.

title: The Mighty (Channel)
description: Channel with diverse mental health topics, especially for connecting students to peer communities for support.

title: Julia Kristina Counseling (Channel)
description: Licensed counselor discusses emotional well-being, building self-esteem, and managing academic stress.

title: Anxiety United (Channel)

title: Kati Morton (Channel)

title: Psych2Go (Channel)

title: SciShow Psych (Channel)

description: Yoga routines focused on anxiety, stress relief, relaxation, and mental fitness for all levels.

title: Living Well With Schizophrenia (Channel)

title: Bite Size Psych (Channel)
description: Science-based 5-minute videos on happiness, motivation, relationships, and productivity.

title: How to ADHD (Channel)
description: Animated explanations and coping strategies for students with ADHD struggles in academic settings.

description: Short-form videos on emotions, resilience, and handling student relationship issues.
